title: Science Learning Design Based on Adult Education and Cognitive Neuroscience

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary science knowledge and understanding of adult learning principles
context.additional_context: Customized educational courses for job seekers to strengthen practical science competencies

learning_goals: Learners can establish and execute self-directed science learning plans by applying andragogical principles.
Learners can explain three or more learning strategies that enhance memory and cognitive efficiency based on cognitive neuroscience research.
Learners can demonstrate the integration of theory and practice through project-based learning linked to real-world job situations.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
